events.name: Landslide in Petrópolis, Brazil
events.wd_description: A landslide triggered by heavy rains in Petrópolis, Brazil, resulted in 110 fatalities, with many still missing, and caused widespread destruction.
events.description: A landslide triggered by heavy rains in Petrópolis, Brazil, resulted in 110 fatalities, with many still missing, and caused widespread destruction.

events.name: Landslide
events.wd_description: A wave of landslides caused by torrential rains led to massive casualties and destruction in the city of Petrópolis, with over 110 fatalities and 134 people still missing.
events.description: A wave of landslides caused by torrential rains led to massive casualties and destruction in the city of Petrópolis, with over 110 fatalities and 134 people still missing.

events.name: Search and Rescue Operations
events.wd_description: Search and rescue teams worked through sludge and debris, rescuing 24 people while 439 others lost their homes; the search for more survivors continues.
events.description: Search and rescue teams worked through sludge and debris, rescuing 24 people while 439 others lost their homes; the search for more survivors continues.

events.name: Government Response
events.wd_description: Brazil's President Jair Bolsonaro, who was abroad during the landslides, directed ministers to provide urgent aid and planned a visit to Petrópolis.
events.description: Brazil's President Jair Bolsonaro, who was abroad during the landslides, directed ministers to provide urgent aid and planned a visit to Petrópolis.

events.name: Cyclone Batsirai Impact in Madagascar
events.wd_description: Cyclone Batsirai struck Madagascar, causing significant damage, displacing thousands, and killing at least ten people, while the country was still recovering from Cyclone Ana.
events.description: Cyclone Batsirai struck Madagascar, causing significant damage, displacing thousands, and killing at least ten people, while the country was still recovering from Cyclone Ana.

events.name: Cyclone Batsirai
events.wd_description: Cyclone Batsirai hit Madagascar's eastern shoreline, causing widespread destruction and displacing 43,000 people.
events.description: Cyclone Batsirai hit Madagascar's eastern shoreline, causing widespread destruction and displacing 43,000 people.

events.name: Displacement and Damage
events.wd_description: The cyclone killed at least ten people and displaced 43,000, with many towns and villages destroyed, and infrastructure severely impacted.
events.description: The cyclone killed at least ten people and displaced 43,000, with many towns and villages destroyed, and infrastructure severely impacted.

events.name: Emergency Response
events.wd_description: Emergency responders faced challenges accessing affected areas, while disaster relief agencies provided basic necessities to displaced individuals in temporary shelters.
events.description: Emergency responders faced challenges accessing affected areas, while disaster relief agencies provided basic necessities to displaced individuals in temporary shelters.

events.name: Sudan Protests and Military Coup Impact
events.wd_label: Sudan Protests and Military Coup Impact
events.wd_description: The military coup in Sudan and subsequent protests have led to widespread violence, economic disruption, and a struggle for power between the military and pro-democracy protesters.
events.description: The military coup in Sudan and subsequent protests have led to widespread violence, economic disruption, and a struggle for power between the military and pro-democracy protesters.

events.name: Military Coup
events.wd_description: The military seized power in Sudan, disrupting a power-sharing agreement with a civilian coalition and leading to widespread unrest and protests.
events.description: The military seized power in Sudan, disrupting a power-sharing agreement with a civilian coalition and leading to widespread unrest and protests.

events.name: Seizure of Power
events.wd_description: The military seized control in Sudan in October, ending the power-sharing agreement with the civilian coalition.
events.description: The military seized control in Sudan in October, ending the power-sharing agreement with the civilian coalition.

events.name: Power-Sharing Agreement Disruption
events.wd_description: The military coup disrupted a power-sharing agreement that had been in place for over two years, leading to political instability.
events.description: The military coup disrupted a power-sharing agreement that had been in place for over two years, leading to political instability.

events.name: Protests and Violence
events.wd_description: Protests erupted across Sudan in response to the military coup, leading to violent clashes between protesters and security forces, resulting in numerous deaths and injuries.
events.description: Protests erupted across Sudan in response to the military coup, leading to violent clashes between protesters and security forces, resulting in numerous deaths and injuries.

events.name: Protests Against Coup
events.wd_description: Protests broke out across Sudan as civilians opposed the military coup and demanded a return to civilian rule.
events.description: Protests broke out across Sudan as civilians opposed the military coup and demanded a return to civilian rule.

events.name: Security Force Violence
events.wd_description: Security forces responded to the protests with violence, opening fire on demonstrators and leading to multiple fatalities.
events.description: Security forces responded to the protests with violence, opening fire on demonstrators and leading to multiple fatalities.

events.name: Casualties and Injuries
events.wd_description: The violent crackdown by security forces resulted in the deaths of more than 70 protesters and thousands of injuries.
events.description: The violent crackdown by security forces resulted in the deaths of more than 70 protesters and thousands of injuries.

events.name: Economic and Political Impact
events.wd_description: The military coup and subsequent unrest have had significant economic and political repercussions, including the resignation of Prime Minister Abdalla Hamdok and the reinstatement of Bashir loyalists.
events.description: The military coup and subsequent unrest have had significant economic and political repercussions, including the resignation of Prime Minister Abdalla Hamdok and the reinstatement of Bashir loyalists.

events.name: Economic Crisis
events.wd_description: The economic gains made during the power-sharing transition have been forfeited, exacerbating the economic crisis in Sudan.
events.description: The economic gains made during the power-sharing transition have been forfeited, exacerbating the economic crisis in Sudan.

events.name: Political Instability
events.wd_description: The coup has led to significant political instability, with ongoing power struggles between the military and pro-democracy protesters.
events.description: The coup has led to significant political instability, with ongoing power struggles between the military and pro-democracy protesters.

events.name: Resignation of PM
events.wd_description: Prime Minister Abdalla Hamdok resigned after realizing he could not work without political backing, further deepening the political crisis.
events.description: Prime Minister Abdalla Hamdok resigned after realizing he could not work without political backing, further deepening the political crisis.

events.name: Reinstatement of Loyalists
events.wd_description: The military ruler Gen Abdel Fattah al-Burhan appointed a caretaker administration that includes Bashir loyalists to steer the country to elections.
events.description: The military ruler Gen Abdel Fattah al-Burhan appointed a caretaker administration that includes Bashir loyalists to steer the country to elections.

events.name: International Response
events.wd_description: The international community, including the UN and the Friends of Sudan group, has been involved in diplomatic efforts to resolve the crisis, but with limited success and varying levels of faith from Sudanese protesters.
events.description: The international community, including the UN and the Friends of Sudan group, has been involved in diplomatic efforts to resolve the crisis, but with limited success and varying levels of faith from Sudanese protesters.

events.name: Diplomatic Efforts
events.wd_description: The UN and the Friends of Sudan, which includes the US, UK, European states, and junta allies Saudi Arabia and the UAE, have been engaged in efforts to find a solution to the crisis.
events.description: The UN and the Friends of Sudan, which includes the US, UK, European states, and junta allies Saudi Arabia and the UAE, have been engaged in efforts to find a solution to the crisis.

events.name: Protests' View on International Response
events.wd_description: Many Sudanese protesters have little faith in the international efforts, feeling that the military should have no role in the government.
events.description: Many Sudanese protesters have little faith in the international efforts, feeling that the military should have no role in the government.

events.name: Development of a Canadian Battery Supply Chain
events.wd_label: Development of a Canadian Battery Supply Chain
events.wd_description: Canada is working to establish a domestic battery supply chain through a "mines to mobility" approach, leveraging its reserves of critical minerals and strong trade agreements with the US and EU, but faces several challenges including minimal manufacturing capacity and slow decision-making processes.
events.description: Canada is working to establish a domestic battery supply chain through a "mines to mobility" approach, leveraging its reserves of critical minerals and strong trade agreements with the US and EU, but faces several challenges including minimal manufacturing capacity and slow decision-making processes.

events.name: Push for Domestic Supply Chain
events.wd_description: Canada is focusing on building a domestic battery supply chain to reduce reliance on Asian producers and to secure critical minerals for EV and grid-scale battery applications.
events.description: Canada is focusing on building a domestic battery supply chain to reduce reliance on Asian producers and to secure critical minerals for EV and grid-scale battery applications.

events.name: Critical Mineral Reserves
events.wd_description: Canada has reserves of cobalt, graphite, lithium, nickel, copper, and manganese, essential for advanced battery production.
events.description: Canada has reserves of cobalt, graphite, lithium, nickel, copper, and manganese, essential for advanced battery production.

events.name: Trade Agreements
events.wd_description: Canada has the infrastructure and trade agreements needed to access the US and EU markets, two of the largest EV markets.
events.description: Canada has the infrastructure and trade agreements needed to access the US and EU markets, two of the largest EV markets.

events.name: Skilled Workforce and R&D Ecosystem
events.wd_description: Canada has a skilled workforce and a cutting-edge battery research and development ecosystem.
events.description: Canada has a skilled workforce and a cutting-edge battery research and development ecosystem.

events.name: Challenges in Establishing Supply Chain
events.wd_description: Canada faces several challenges in developing a mature battery supply chain, including minimal manufacturing capacity, slow decision-making, small market size, and competition with China.
events.description: Canada faces several challenges in developing a mature battery supply chain, including minimal manufacturing capacity, slow decision-making, small market size, and competition with China.

events.name: Manufacturing and Processing Capacity
events.wd_description: Canada has minimal manufacturing capacity and lacks the processing capacity for battery-grade materials.
events.description: Canada has minimal manufacturing capacity and lacks the processing capacity for battery-grade materials.

events.name: Decision-Making and Administrative Processes
events.wd_description: Canada is slow in decision-making, causing long lead times for administrative processes, permitting, and funding allocations.
events.description: Canada is slow in decision-making, causing long lead times for administrative processes, permitting, and funding allocations.

events.name: Market Size and Investment
events.wd_description: Canada’s small market size makes it difficult to scale up domestic battery supply chains and establish major manufacturing facilities.
events.description: Canada’s small market size makes it difficult to scale up domestic battery supply chains and establish major manufacturing facilities.

events.name: Technology and Supply Chain Uncertainty
events.wd_description: The rapidly changing nature of battery technology and uncertainty around investment flows and new players entering the market pose challenges for supply chain development.
events.description: The rapidly changing nature of battery technology and uncertainty around investment flows and new players entering the market pose challenges for supply chain development.

events.name: Priority Actions for Development
events.wd_description: Canada has identified priority actions to establish itself in the global battery industry, focusing on funding, cooperation with the US, promoting a clean and responsible battery brand, and forming task forces.
events.description: Canada has identified priority actions to establish itself in the global battery industry, focusing on funding, cooperation with the US, promoting a clean and responsible battery brand, and forming task forces.

events.name: Funding and Cooperation
events.wd_description: Canada plans to focus funding and cooperate with the US to develop its battery supply chain.
events.description: Canada plans to focus funding and cooperate with the US to develop its battery supply chain.

events.name: Clean Battery Brand Promotion
events.wd_description: Canada aims to promote a clean and responsible battery brand to attract investment and market interest.
events.description: Canada aims to promote a clean and responsible battery brand to attract investment and market interest.

events.name: Formation of Task Forces
events.wd_description: Task forces from the government and enterprises will be formed to drive the development of the battery supply chain.
events.description: Task forces from the government and enterprises will be formed to drive the development of the battery supply chain.

events.name: Development of Next-Generation Battery Technologies in Western Canada
events.wd_label: Development of Next-Generation Battery Technologies in Western Canada
events.wd_description: Western Canada is focusing on developing next-generation battery technologies, such as all-solid-state batteries, which offer greater energy densities, faster charging, and safer operation than current lithium-ion batteries.
events.description: Western Canada is focusing on developing next-generation battery technologies, such as all-solid-state batteries, which offer greater energy densities, faster charging, and safer operation than current lithium-ion batteries.

events.name: Western Canada Battery Consortium
events.wd_description: Founded by Dr. Venkataraman Thangadurai, the Western Canada Battery Consortium (WCBC) brings together battery experts and industrial partners to advance battery technology and supply chain development.
events.description: Founded by Dr. Venkataraman Thangadurai, the Western Canada Battery Consortium (WCBC) brings together battery experts and industrial partners to advance battery technology and supply chain development.

events.name: Battery Innovation Hub
events.wd_description: The Battery Innovation Hub (BIH) will provide facilities and expertise to evaluate, certify, and qualify battery development, focusing on next-generation solid-state batteries.
events.description: The Battery Innovation Hub (BIH) will provide facilities and expertise to evaluate, certify, and qualify battery development, focusing on next-generation solid-state batteries.

events.name: Research and Development Facilities
events.wd_description: The BIH will include facilities for raw material extraction, refinement, processing, advanced electrode preparation, cell assembly, testing, and safety assessments.
events.description: The BIH will include facilities for raw material extraction, refinement, processing, advanced electrode preparation, cell assembly, testing, and safety assessments.

events.name: Industry Collaboration
events.wd_description: The BIH aims to collaborate with battery researchers and industry partners to foster innovation and create intellectual property for commercialization.
events.description: The BIH aims to collaborate with battery researchers and industry partners to foster innovation and create intellectual property for commercialization.

events.name: Research and Development Initiatives
events.wd_description: The WCBC and BIH will focus on developing safe, high-energy-density solid-state batteries using locally available lithium and sulphur resources, and on training researchers in Canada.
events.description: The WCBC and BIH will focus on developing safe, high-energy-density solid-state batteries using locally available lithium and sulphur resources, and on training researchers in Canada.

events.name: Solid-State Battery Development
events.wd_description: The consortium plans to develop solid-state batteries with about five times the energy density of current lithium-ion batteries.
events.description: The consortium plans to develop solid-state batteries with about five times the energy density of current lithium-ion batteries.

events.name: Researcher Training
events.wd_description: Initiatives will focus on training and employing researchers to support the development and commercialization of advanced battery technologies in Canada.
events.description: Initiatives will focus on training and employing researchers to support the development and commercialization of advanced battery technologies in Canada.
